title: How to Get Back to Pandaria from Orgrimmar

steps.title: Visit the Valley of Honor.
steps.content: Visit the Valley of Honor. This sub-zone is on the east side of Orgrimmar, with a large river through it.

steps.title: Look for a red balloon.
steps.content: Look for a red balloon. Look for a bright red hot air balloon floating above the Valley, just past the bridge from the city center. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the portal to Honeydew Village.
steps.content: Enter the portal to Honeydew Village. This portal is located directly below this balloon, next to the Pandaren monk trainer Ji Firepaw.

steps.title: Confirm that you've completed the intro quest.
steps.content: Confirm that you've completed the intro quest. If you've only visited Pandaria by using warlock summons or mage portals, the portal will not appear. Check your quest log or an Orgrimmar Warchief's Command Board for The Art of War quest. Once the quest line takes you to Pandaria, the portal in Orgrimmar will open. You must be level 85 or higher to start this quest.

steps.title: Repeat the quest line after a faction change.
steps.content: Repeat the quest line after a faction change. If you've transferred from Alliance since your first visit to Pandaria, you'll have to repeat this quest from the Horde side. Start the quest chain with The Art of War quest, as described above.

steps.title: Unlock the portal on a boosted character.
steps.content: Unlock the portal on a boosted character. If you purchased a character boost to level 90 or above, a bug may mark the first quest complete. Fly to the airship to the northwest of the docks instead to find the next quest in the chain. [2] X Research source
